code: import i18n from'i18next';import{initReactI18next}from'react-i18next';import translationEN from'./locales/en/translation.json';import translationDE from'./locales/de/translation.json';var resources={en:{translation:translationEN},de:{translation:translationDE}};i18n.use(initReactI18next).init({resources:resources,lng:'en',interpolation:{escapeValue:false}});export default i18n;
